double_crochet increase - double_crochet increase page 2 a d d i t i o n a l s k i l l s magic_ring modified crocodile stitch p a t t e r n n o t e s starting chains are counted as stitches slip stitches are not counted as stitches all instructions are written using american crochet terminology page 3 b o t t o m o f t h e b a g begin with a magic_ring round 1 chain 3 counts as the first stitch throughout the pattern 9 double_crochet into the center of the magic_ring join with slip_stitch 10 round 2 chain 3 double_crochet into the same stitch then double_crochet increase around two double_crochet in each stitch from the previous round join with slip_stitch 20 round 3 chain 3 double_crochet increase in next stitch then *double_crochet double_crochet increase* around join with slip_stitch 30 round 4 chain 3 double_crochet in next stitch double_crochet increase then *2 double_crochet double_crochet increase* around join with sl st 40 round 5 chain 3 double_crochet in next 2 stitches double_crochet increase then *3 double_crochet double_crochet increase* around join with slip_stitch 50 page 4 b o d y o f t h e b a g the body of the bag is made up of repeated modified crocodile stitches which look more complicated than they actually are each row of dragon scales is composed of two rounds the first round is all double_crochet and serves as the foundation for the round where you will create the actual scales from double_crochet and sl stitches page 5 b o d y c o n t i n u e d round 6 chain 3 double_crochet around 50 round 7 chain 3 4 double_crochet around the post of the double_crochet just below the starting chain from the previous round turn work 180 degrees and 5 double_crochet around the post of the next double_crochet from the previous round skip one stitch then slip_stitch into the top of the next stitch to secure the edge of the scale *skip 3 double_crochet posts from the previous round and place 5 double_crochet around the post of the 4th stitch turn work 180 degrees and place 5 double_crochet around the next double_crochet post from the previous round skip
